DOC.brief_summary: Study design : - Phase I , first-in-human , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , sequential dose escalation study intravenously administer HM10760A healthy adult Caucasian Japanese subject . Up 5 dose level cohort plan . In dose level cohort , subject randomize receive single dose HM10760A placebo . Primary Objective : - To evaluate safety profile single intravenous ( IV ) dose level HM10760A healthy adult Caucasian Japanese subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study HM10760A ( Long-acting Erythropoietin ) Healthy Adult Caucasian Japanese Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary Objectives : - To evaluate dose response relationship single IV dose HM10760A pharmacodynamic parameter - To assess immunogenicity single IV dose HM10760A .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasian Japanese male and/or female volunteer Age 18 55 year Hemoglobin > 12 g/dL < 16 g/dL male subject , > 10 g/dL < 14 g/dL female Caucasian subject Prior exposure EPO , darbepoetin , EPO support proteins hypersensitivity EPO , darbepoetin , E.coli derive protein Hemoglobinopathy SBP > 140 mmHg < 90 mmHg DBP > 95 mmHg Chronic , uncontrolled , symptomatic inflammatory disease Malignancy ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer )
